price: 我们的养主啊！在无疑之日，你必定集合世人。安拉确是不爽约的。”
arabic: رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ جَامِعُ ٱلنَّاسِ لِيَوۡمٖ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُخۡلِفُ ٱلۡمِيعَادَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā innaka jāmiʿu al-nāsi liyawmin lā rayba fīhi inna al-laha lā yukh'lifu al-mīʿāda
